name: Gomoku HD
description:
Gomoku is a simple yet challenging game that requires focus and strategy. Alternate placing a stone of your color on an empty intersection. Your goal is to create a continuous horizontal, vertical, or diagonal row of stones of your color (white or black). Whoever creates a row first is the winner. Choose your color and difficulty level and start playing now!

We value feedback, so please leave your reviews in the AppStore or contact us directly at games@greyheadstudio.com for suggestions or comments :)
